channel.title: Changing the max hit of an NPC - Deltascape Source
channel.description:
Alright, so I was wondering, I decided to add in a few dragons for a higher-leveled train area. But, I noticed, they don't hit back pretty much and when they do it's like a maximum of 1-2.. So I was wondering how to change this?
Thanks for any help,
Clay.

item.title: Changing the max hit of an NPC - Deltascape Source
item.dc:creator: @bigh51 bigh51
item.description:
@bigh51 wrote:

[quote=“barragey0uXD, post:6, topic:235282”]I can help, hold on i look for code now,

Edit:
OK,
hitDiff = 6 + misc.random(20);

There should be a code like this or so, change the 6 to like wut you want, and i dont know what misc.random is, dont know much about these.
Hope it helps…[/quote]Maybe it’s a random number that is lower than 20? Lol…

[quote=“King Redrum, post:10, topic:235282”][quote author=barragey0uXD link=topic=310283.msg2476992#msg2476992 date=1223320265]
I can help, hold on i look for code now,

Edit:
OK,
hitDiff = 6 + misc.random(20);

There should be a code like this or so, change the 6 to like wut you want, and i dont know what misc.random is, dont know much about these.
Hope it helps…
[/quote]

Brings up nothing but if I delete (20); it brings up two things.

if (npcs[NPCID].npcType == 1645) { gfxAll(369, EnemyY, EnemyX); hitDiff = 6 + misc.random(43);

And

if (npcs[NPCID].npcType == 1645) { gfxAll(369, EnemyY, EnemyX); hitDiff = 6 + misc.random(43);

The second one is DIRECTLY under the first, so, lol.

Try searching misc.random in NpcHandler.java, might be a random max hit ;O.

Brings up ALL kinds of crap, but none of it matches the ID or type, or hell even deals with the hit I believe… This is confuzling (lol).[/quote]Imagine if you did real coding how confusing that would be to you. You would be so confused you would probably have to kill yourself.

Read full topic

item.description:
@si_force wrote:

[quote=“Jordiescape, post:11, topic:235282”]if (npcs[NPCID].npcType == 1645) { // NPC ID gfxAll(369, EnemyY, EnemyX); // The gfx the NPC will do on attack? hitDiff = 6 + misc.random(43);// The hitdifference
See what i’ve commented on it, see if it helps.[/quote]

y u lech dat quaoet pls, i saw dat in paost abuv u nd liek
u just coapy nd paest it to ur paoest nd den u liek add sumethin,

Anyway, I don’t think they’ll notice.

item.title: Changing the max hit of an NPC - Deltascape Source
item.dc:creator: @King_Redrum King Redrum
item.description:
@King_Redrum wrote:

[quote=“barragey0uXD, post:6, topic:235282”]I can help, hold on i look for code now,

Edit:
OK,
hitDiff = 6 + misc.random(20);

There should be a code like this or so, change the 6 to like wut you want, and i dont know what misc.random is, dont know much about these.
Hope it helps…[/quote]

Brings up nothing but if I delete (20); it brings up two things.

if (npcs[NPCID].npcType == 1645) { gfxAll(369, EnemyY, EnemyX); hitDiff = 6 + misc.random(43);

And

if (npcs[NPCID].npcType == 1645) { gfxAll(369, EnemyY, EnemyX); hitDiff = 6 + misc.random(43);

The second one is DIRECTLY under the first, so, lol.

Jordiescape:

Try searching misc.random in NpcHandler.java, might be a random max hit ;O.

Brings up ALL kinds of crap, but none of it matches the ID or type, or hell even deals with the hit I believe… This is confuzling (lol).

Read full topic
